Articles.Content:
Hello, I have recently been having issues with one of the contracts in Kerbal, I am unsure if I have done something wrong or if it is a problem on the games side.

I launched my usual probe to complete the orbit, however the mission does not recognize me as performing the designated orbit but it would appear to be very hard to get a closer orbit than the one I have.

http://imgur.com/cg5esGk,Xo8vXnU#0

Two images of the orbit can be found in the link above, any help would be appreciated.

Edited December 20, 2014 by Codas

There's a fairly wide margin on the "match orbit" missions so if you're very close and it's still not completing you may be going in the wrong direction.

Edited to add- To check mouse over the AN or DN node. If it says 180Ã‚Â° instead of 0Ã‚Â° you're going backwards.

Edited December 20, 2014 by Reactordrone
I didn't think it could go in the wrong direction...huh that's probably it, I will go test that, thank you.
